title: ghost small grey circle right hand side of camera's crosshair shows up in photos
content:
So, as the title of the post indicateds, a small grey circle  is present near the centre of the frame when I want to take a photo. If the area right of centre is white, then you can quite clearly see the same small grey circle in the picture that has been snapped.

I have cleaned the lens cover twice, first with a paper towel, then with fine cotton and lens cleaner, but the small grey circle persists in my photos.

I don't want to return my new Pixel A4 before I have exhausted all the possibilities.

Thanks for any constructive input..
